price: 172. Baye bayanolaki na mbela ya Allah na ya motindami sima ya bango kozoka ba mpota. Kasi mpona ba oyo basalaki malamu kati na bango, mpe babangi (Allah), bakozala na lifuta linene.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡقَرۡحُۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna is'tajābū lillahi wal-rasūli min baʿdi mā aṣābahumu al-qarḥu lilladhīna aḥsanū min'hum wa-ittaqaw ajrun ʿaẓīmun
